title: Committees Sign Up - Greater Springfield Board of Realtors

contentTree.content:
Committees Sign Up

You can sign up to be on a committee at any time. Complete the form below to be added to the roster and begin being notified of future meetings. This will be valid for one calendar year only. Please send any questions to support@gsbor.com.

Full Name*
Company
Email Address*
Phone
Years in Business
How many years in business?
0-3 Years
4-7 Years
8-12 Years
13+ Years
What is your role in the industry? (Member Type)*
 Affiliate
 Appraiser
 Broker Manager
 Broker Salesperson
 Designated REALTOR® Broker (DR)
 Salesperson Agent
What committees are you interested in?*
 Affiliate
 Appraiser
 Awards & Events
 Community Development
 Education
 RHP (REALTORS® Helping People)
 RPAC (REALTOR® Political Action Committee)
 RPC (REALTOR® Party Committee)
 Technology Committee
 YPN (Young Professionals Network)
Additional Comments
CAPTCHA

* Required
By clicking submit, you agree that you are the individual whose information has been entered above or that you have that individual’s express consent to submit their information.

(417) 883-1226
(417) 520-0977
support@gsbor.com
1310 E Primrose St, Springfield, MO 65804

Web Accessibility
Web Accessibility

Greater Springfield Board of Realtors®, Inc. is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.

If you have difficulty accessing content, have difficulty viewing a file on the website, or notice any accessibility problems, please contact us to specify the nature of the accessibility issue and any assistive technology you use. We will strive to provide the content you need in the format you require.
